title: Test Your Agent
lede: Learn how to test your AI agent through the dashboard interface and API calls.

sections.title: Dashboard Testing
sections.content:
Test your agent directly from the iMash dashboard with built-in testing tools.

Testing Options:

  • Quick Test: Immediate conversation simulation
  • Phone Call Test: Make real test calls to any number
  • Flow Testing: Test specific conversation paths
  • Voice Preview: Listen to agent voice samples

sections.title: API Testing
sections.content:
Test your agent programmatically through API endpoints.

Test Endpoints:

  • Start Call: Initiate test calls via API
  • Conversation: Send text messages to test responses
  • Webhooks: Test event notifications

The agent testing dashboard with various testing options

metaTitle: Test Your Agent - Validate AI Performance | iMash Docs
metaDescription: Test your AI agents with phone calls and simulations. Debug conversations and validate agent behavior before deployment.
